channel.title: Help pl0xz0r?

item.title: Help pl0xz0r?
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Ok, this is what i been trying to figure out, i know how to make it to use a item on a item and get something, and a certin slayer level, but idk how to make it for a certin level like atk str def or something to wear a item, ive tired alot of things. i need help please on how to make a item need a certin def level(Yes i know where to add it)
Heres a **

if (type == 10124) { if (playerLevel[4] < 90) { sM("You must be 90 range or higher to wear this."); ItemHandler.RemoveItem(); return false; } }

Thats something ive tired, just please help me. i need to know how to make it remove a item if u dont have the level needed like above
If you could help me on teamviewer my id is
:169 041 096
and pass is 2291

Read full topic
